text: Niscayanga, evaraite satyanni tiraskaristu (prajalanu) allah margam nundi, masjid al haram nundi atankaparustaro - denikaite memu andari koraku samananga cesi unnamo - varu akkada nivasincevaraina sare, leda bayata nundi vaccina varaina sare. Mariyu evaraina dulo apavitrata mariyu an'yayam ceyagorutaro, alanti variki memu badhakaramaina siksanu ruci cuputamu
